abort.already_setup: You can only configure one Somfy account.
abort.authorize_url_fail: Unknown error generating an authorize url.
abort.external_setup: Somfy successfully configured from another flow.
abort.no_flows: You need to configure Somfy before being able to authenticate with it. [Please read the instructions](https://www.home-assistant.io/components/somfy/).

error.follow_link: Please follow the link and authenticate before pressing Submit

auth.description: Please follow the link below and Accept access to your Somfy account, then come back and press Submit below. [Link]({authorization_url})
auth.title: Authenticate Somfy

user.description: Pick via which authentication provider you want to authenticate with Somfy.
user.title: Authentication Provider
